title: PewDiePie and wife Marzia Kjellberg get matching tattoos for birthdays
text:
The pair opted for spontaneous tats for their birthdays (Picture: PewDiePie/Instagram)

PewDiePie and his wife Marzia Kjellberg are going all out for their birthdays as they showed off their new matching tattoos.

The pair, who tied the knot back in August after eight years together, commemorated their big day with a pair of heart tattoos.

Sharing a snap of hers wrapped up on Instagram, Marzia wrote: ‘Felix asked me if I’m down to get a spontaneous tattoo (which I’m always down for hehe).

‘We had been meaning to get tattoos since the wedding, but there was always so much going on, so finally yesterday I designed mine and headed to @katja_velvettattoo.’

The pair showed off their spontaneous tats (Picture: @itsmarziapie)

While Marzia went for an ‘F’, a ’19’ and a flame in a heart, adorned with a small plant and stars, Felix opted for a simple heart with an ‘M’.

Meanwhile, celebrating the former YouTuber’s 27th birthday, the couple enjoyed a fancy dinner at the Ivy in Brighton, and catching up on some TV with their pals.

With Felix’s birthday falling just a couple of days after his wife’s, it’s definitely set to be a week of celebration for the pair.

The couple recently returned from a second honeymoon in Japan (which is where they got engaged back in 2018).

Sharing scenes that looked straight out of a postcard, they gave everyone major travel envy – except for Marzia’s gruesome toe injury that is.

The pair have also been celebrating their two month wedding anniversary with some throwback snaps.

Sharing four new photos from the wedding to his Instagram page, Felix commented ‘2 months ago today’ with a smiley face.

Marzia’s been celebrating her 27th birthday (Picture: @itsmarziapie)

In the emotional wedding video posted after the ceremony, the 29-year-old said: ‘I am most of all happy and grateful to finally be Marzia’s husband.

‘We met at a time where I was feeling very lost, but every day since I met Marzia has been the best days of my life.

‘Marzia has taught me to always go for what you want, without any hesitation, and that has opened my life to so many new experiences that I never would have even dreamed to be possible.

Tearing up, he added: ‘But most importantly, Marzia brings out the best in me and I feel so fortunate to be spending the rest of my life with this amazing woman.’
